summary: A Program Schedule app with weekday program slots functionality.

existing_features.title: Update the ManagePrograms admin page to allow admins to create, edit, and delete program slots specifically for weekdays (Mondayâ€“Friday). The add/edit dialog form must include a day-of-week selector field offering at minimum the five weekday options.
Update the public SchedulePage to display program slots grouped or labeled by weekday (Monday through Friday), so listeners can browse what shows are scheduled on each day of the week.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add weekday program slots to Program Schedule

Update the backend Program data model and schedule storage to support weekday-specific program slots, allowing programs to be assigned to specific weekdays (Monday through Friday) with start time, end time, name, and description fields.
